content.title:
Work with
Powerful Features
content.text: Livingdocs is built to make you more productive. Our set of features empowers you to create exactly the project you need.

content.title: Collaboration at the Core
content.text1: Visually keep track of every change in your documents and easily go back and forth in your editing history.
content.text2: Discuss with your fellow writers how to best come up with the content you need, write comments, build discussion threads and resolve conversations as you go.

content.title: Workflows
content.text: Organize workflows from proofreading to translations in kanban boards and always see what needs to be done next.

content.title: Realtime collaboration
content.text: Always see who is editing the same document with you and easily exchange the lead.

content.title: Lock
content.text: Sometimes you want to edit alone. The lock plugin allows you to set time-limited locks on a document where only you can edit.

content.title: Fully Organized Content
content.text1: Use the power of customizable dashboards to give entry points to every possible user group, be it writers, proofreaders or editors-in-chief. Present content on your dashboards in lists, visual layouts or kanban boards.

content.title: Elastic Search
content.text: Use our powerful ElasticSearch based search engine to find content and enable our Natural Language Processing module to automatically tag all content.

content.title: Filters
content.text: Use our predefined filters or create new ones for your use cases and organize filters in bookmarks for fast access.

content.title: «It’s not where you take things from – it’s where you take them to.» – Jean-Luc Godard
content.text:
The Livingdocs Ecosystem enables media companies to succeed in their digital transformation. We built in a collection of best-of-breed modules in order to satisfy the whole lifecycle of a news publication.

- Planning, DeskNet
- Machine Learning, iMatrics and Google Vision
- Print, WoodWing Enterprise
- Interactives and Graphics, NZZ Q
- Video, Brightcove
- Push Notifications, Google Firebase and e-thinking
- Feed management, alephDAM
- DAM / E-Paper, huGO+
